get.description: Retrieve a run for an app in the workspace identified by {wId}.

specification_hash.description: The hash of the app specification

post.description: Create a run for an app in the workspace identified by {wId}.

specification_hash.description: The hash of the specification to use. If you change your app specifiction, make sure to update the hash. This guarantees that you won't break an existing API integration by iterating on your app design.

provider_id.description: The ID of the model provider

items.description: An individual input for the app

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

get.description: Get all apps of a workspace.

405.description: Method not supported. Only GET is expected.

post.description: Create a new content fragment in the workspace identified by {wId}.

title.description: The title of the content fragment

content.description: The content of the content fragment

url.description: The URL of the content fragment

contentType.description: The content type of the content fragment

username.description: The username of the user who created the content fragment

fullName.description: The full name of the user who created the content fragment

email.description: The email of the user who created the content fragment

profilePictureUrl.description: The profile picture URL of the user who created the content fragment

parameters.description: ID of the last event received

post.description: Create a message in the workspace identified by {wId}.

items.description: The mentions of the message, where configurationId is the ID of the assistant mentioned.

fullName.description: The full name of the user who created the message

email.description: The email of the user who created the message

get.summary: Retrieve a document from a data source
get.description: Retrieve a document from a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

post.summary: Upsert a document in a data source
post.description: Upsert a document in a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

text.description: The text content of the document to upsert.

source_url.description: The source URL for the document to upsert.

light_document_output.description: If true, a lightweight version of the document will be returned in the response (excluding the text, chunks and vectors). Defaults to false.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden. The data source is managed.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

delete.summary: Delete a document from a data source
delete.description: Delete a document from a data source in the workspace identified by {wId}.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

403.description: Forbidden. The data source is managed.

404.description: Data source or document not found.

post.summary: Update the parents of a document
post.description: Update the parents of a document in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

400.description: Bad Request. Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Data source or workspace not found.

get.description: Get documents in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of documents returned

404.description: The data source was not found

get.description: Search the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: top_k
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: full_text
parameters.description: Whether to perform a full text search

parameters.name: target_document_tokens
parameters.description: The number of tokens in the target document

get.description: Get a table in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

delete.description: Delete a table in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

get.description: Get a row in the table identified by {tId} in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

get.description: List rows in the table identified by {tId} in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of rows returned

post.description: Upsert rows in the table identified by {tId} in the data source identified by {name} in the workspace identified by {wId}.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid or missing authentication token.

404.description: Data source or workspace not found.

get.description: Get data sources in the workspace identified by {wId}.
Get the feature flags for the workspace identified by {wId}.
List the emails of all members in the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: activeOnly
parameters.description: Whether to list only active members

get.description: Get usage data for the workspace identified by {wId}.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date in YYYY-MM-DD format

get.description: Get the verified domain for the workspace identified by {wId}.
